amendment.description: Amendment sought to direct funding from AML certified States for use in revitalizing economically distressed communities which have been adversely affected by discharge from abandoned mine lands.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-395 to direct funding from AML certified states for use in revitalizing economically distressed communities which have been adversely affected by discharge from abandoned mine lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 219 (Roll no. 39).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 219 (Roll no. 39).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Cartwright.
